commit.message: Added event constants for OTP and recovery scenarios

nodes.bodyText: Is this related to the email verification? If so can we say PRE_VERIFY_EMAIL or PRE_TRIGGER_EMAIL_VERIFICATION? WDYT?
Since these are event-related constants I think the variable name and the value should say about the event, not about the claim. wdyt?
